The '''Lightkeepers''' are an organization from [[Nod-Krai]], [[Snezhnaya]].

The Lightkeepers were founded by the first [[Torchforger]] in ancient times, and have long defended Nod-Krai against [[The Wild Hunt|Wild Hunt]] attacks launched by the [[Abyss]].<ref name=LNO>{{Ref/ArtiSet|Long Night's Oath}}</ref> They fought in the [[Cataclysm]], and have become severely weakened due to previous battles.<ref>[[Song of the Welkin Moon]]</ref>
